title: El Camino Real de los Tejas National Historic Trail: Olmos Basin Road Segment
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     A Photographic Journey of the Trail     A Photographic Journey - Pictures 1-15     Olmos Basin Road Segment                  Olmos Basin Road Segment        Christopher Talbot   Â    Olmos Basin Road Segment, Bexar County, Texas A branch of the old Nacogdoches Road used to run from Olmos Dam to Hildebrand Avenue. The trail segment can be seen from the right-of-way. Time period: 1700s Ownership: Private A Photographic Journey of the Trail - NEXT IMAGE PREVIOUS IMAGE
